name: Le Meridien Bangkok

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just want to say congratulations to Le Meridien Bangkok, Amazing hotel, great employees, great rooms, great spa. We had a lovely time in the hotel an excellent experience full of attention from everybody.
reviews.title: Just Excellent

likes.liked: — Spa, Cleanliness of the rooms, Front office staff

reviews.text: The location is excellent you are in the middle of Bangkok, and the sky train station at a short walk.
reviews.title: A nice little hotel

likes.disliked: — The 2 automatic curtains in the room did not completely black out the room

reviews.text: Thank you again and we will come back soon!!
reviews.title: Very Chic and Trendy Hotel

likes.liked: — The staff, the design of the hotel and the location
likes.disliked: — The inconvenience of the electrical socket in the room

reviews.text: Finally Le Méridien Bangkok is open. I have been waiting every since Apr 'til now. Is worth the wait despite it has been postponing for few times and receiving letter from the management. I’m a loyal guest of Starwood Hotels, but Le Méridien is the only brand that I have not tried out, especially the re-brand.
reviews.title: Love the Le Meridien Bangkok

reviews.text: My first experience in this Europe lifestyle hotel is thumbs up. From the point fo reservation with the impressive staff and recommendation for accomodations. Overall staffs here are very warm and friendly. I feel like I’m queen especially I’m the first few guests that have check in. The style of the hotel is different and very unique. The look outside and inside is totally unbelievable, is just like you stepping into a different world. Once you are in is so WOW. The hotel looks small but is not. The Spa and swimming pool is cool. The size of the room is normal just like any other hotel in Bangkok but the hardware is very fantastic especially the LM bed, the IP phone (touch-screen) and chic bathroom. You guys should try it out!!!!
reviews.title: Never imagined

reviews.text: Stayed at the spanking new Le Meridien in Bangkok last week. Located just opposite the Patpong, this hotel seems to have gotten it right as a newly opened hotel in a highly competitive market such as Bangkok. The staff seem well trained, friendly and spontaneous. The room is comfortable. Overall, the hotel fits in well with the new Le Meridien brand image. There are 2 restaurant outlets, both of which offer meals at very good value for a 5* hotel. Breakfast is fantastic with excellent choices. Overall, a very pleasant stay.
reviews.title: Nice new hotel!

reviews.text: First, it's important to note that I am a SPG Plantinum member, and some of these benefits are not available to all.
reviews.title: Wonderful Staff, great hotel

reviews.text: #1 The service here was amazing. Only 3 floors of the hotel are currently open, as the property itself just opened recently. The staff to guest ratio is pretty high, so plenty of attention is given to all. Of all the staff interactions I had, I felt all of them truly cared for my well-being.
reviews.title: Le Meridien BKK is THE jewel of Bangkok!

reviews.text: #2 Location is near Sale Daeng metro rail and in the Patpong district. It is lively in the area, with plenty of street vendors and excitement. Good mix of locals and tourists alike. The hotel is one of the best in the neighborhood, and that is made obvious when passer-by's are taking pictures of the hotel from the street.
reviews.title: Millenial Cool meets Inviting Warmth
Le Meridien Bangkok Excellent Services
reviews.text: That said, nearby, the area does get a bit "seedy" at night with plenty of offers of massage, visits to shows, and other services. It didn't bother me one bit, and I felt it gives the area some character. If nothing else, makes you appreciate coming back to the hotel. I just wouldn't let my kids run free, unsupervised.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic hotel with the most incredible staff...this hotel has it all. Not to be missed.
reviews.title: Slice Of Heaven

description: Located in Silom commercial district and just metres from the energetic Patpong Night Market, Le Meridien Bangkok offers 282 guestrooms and touch screen IP phone. An innovative restaurants, a bar and a stylish lounge entice guests with menus introducing stimulating cuisine, creative cocktails and an international range of coffee blends. Also available are the intimate meeting rooms, a unique lifestyle floor with Spa, fitness and outdoor pool.
